reviewText: DvDjs GRIND the hottest street beat mixes of the latest hip-hop and rap music videos, action movies, movie previews and trailers, comedy clips and up-and-coming artists all "Up in the GRIND" in one seamless non-stop DVD.  This is the hottest new entertainment format that will take the "DJ" and mixtape market to the next level.  "The DvDj is the evolution of treet entertainment!..."  Drop it and pop it at parties, in the ride or at the club!
